sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā tōutōu de líkāi le fángjiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a quitté la chambre en cachette.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā xǐhuan shōují yóupiào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il aime collectionner des timbres.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他用各种手段达到目的。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yòng gèzhǒng shǒuduàn dádào mùdì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il utilise tous les moyens pour atteindre son but.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He uses various means to achieve his goal.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zài shìchǎng bùmén gōngzuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je travaille au département marketing.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I work in the marketing department.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Suìyuè liúshì de hěn kuài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le temps passe très vite.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tùzi pǎo de hěn kuài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le lapin court très vite.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè kē shù de gēn hěn shēn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les racines de cet arbre sont très profondes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The roots of this tree are very deep.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yào xiāochú wùjiě.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons éliminer les malentendus.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yǒu jiāndìng de xìnniàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a des convictions fermes.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jūnduì zhànlǐng le zhè zuò chéngshì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'armée a occupé cette ville.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tāmen pádào le shāndǐng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ils ont grimpé jusqu'au sommet de la montagne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: They climbed to the top of the mountain.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī jiàn zhēnguì de lǐwù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un cadeau précieux.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ dìtú juǎn qǐlái.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez rouler la carte.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gōngzī huì yǒu xiāngyìng de tiáozhěng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les salaires seront ajustés en conséquence.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他制作了一个精美的视频。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zhìzuò le yī gè jīngměi de shìpín.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a réalisé une belle vidéo.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 先写一个提纲再开始写文章。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiān xiě yī gè tígāng zài kāishǐ xiě wénzhāng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Écris d'abord un plan avant de commencer l'article.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Write an outline first before starting the article.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 钢铁工业是国家的支柱产业。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gāngtiě gōngyè shì guójiā de zhīzhù chǎnyè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'industrie sidérurgique est une industrie pilier du pays.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The steel industry is a pillar industry of the country.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 为国家做贡献是光荣的。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wèi guójiā zuò gòngxiàn shì guāngróng de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Contribuer à son pays est honorable.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Contributing to the country is glorious.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yòng jiāzi bǎ wénjiàn jiāzhù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Utilisez un trombone pour attacher les documents.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Use a clip to hold the documents together.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xīcān yào yòng dāochā chī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: On mange la cuisine occidentale avec un couteau et une fourchette.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Western food is eaten with a knife and fork.
